title: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the bug occurs. The Team entry is missing from the context menu.
EB: The expected behavior is for the Team entry to be present in the context menu when trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Open the context menu.
2. Check if the Team entry is missing from the menu when attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource.
